TopicTitle: Hello. Cant find how to give rep point to someone special.

Articles.Content: I see people giving reputation to each other, but when I wanted to give to someone whos work I admire, cant find how to do it. I searched and searched.

See the six-pointed-star on the little menu bar at the bottom of the posts? Click on that and you get a little dialog box for giving rep. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Check out these two posts:

[Answers for New Users - What is reputation?](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/48073-Forum-FAQ-%E2%80%93-Answers-for-New-Users/page2?p=637119#post637119)

[Explanation of the Reputation System](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/16618-Explanation-of-the-Reputation-System)

To summarize:

As Vanamonde said click the six pointed star. ![HCqhI4A.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/HCqhI4A.jpg)

And you're a new forum user. You reputation power is most likely not yet activated. Don't worry, it should kick in automatically after you've posted more on the forum.
Thank you. I got the star today and could give rep to my favorit modder ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Thank you. I got the star today and could give rep to my favorit modder ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Mind if i ask who that is? And welcome to the forums!
